010package imagingbook.pub.color.quantize;
011
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013import java.util.LinkedList;
014import java.util.List;
015
016import org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.CentroidCluster;
017import org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.DoublePoint;
018import org.apache.commons.math3.ml.clustering.KMeansPlusPlusClusterer;
019
020import ij.IJ;
021import ij.ImagePlus;
022import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
023import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
024import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
025
026
027
028/**
029 * This class implements color quantization by k-means clustering
030 * of image pixels in RGB color space. It uses the Apache Commons
031 * Math class {@link KMeansPlusPlusClusterer} to perform the
032 * clustering.
033 * 
034 * @author WB
035 * @version 2017/01/04
036 */
037public class KMeansClusteringQuantizerApache implements ColorQuantizer {
038        
039        private final Parameters params;
040        private final float[][] colormap;
041        
042//      private final Clusterer<DoublePoint> clusterer;
043        private final List<CentroidCluster<DoublePoint>> centers;
044        
045        public enum SamplingMethod {
046                Random, Most_Frequent
047        };
048        
049        public static class Parameters {
050                /** Maximum number of quantized colors. */
051                public int maxColors = 16;
052                /** Maximum number of clustering iterations */
053                public int maxIterations = 500;
054                
055                void check() {
056                        if (maxColors < 2 || maxColors > 256 || maxIterations < 1) {
057                                throw new IllegalArgumentException();
058                        }
059                }
060        }
061        
062        // --------------------------------------------------------------
063
064        public KMeansClusteringQuantizerApache(ColorProcessor cp, Parameters params) {
065                this((int[]) cp.getPixels(), params);
066        }
067        
068        /**
069         * Creates a new quantizer instance from the supplied sequence
070         * of color values (assumed to be ARGB-encoded integers). 
071         * @param pixels Sequence of input color values.
072         * @param params Parameter object.
073         */
074        public KMeansClusteringQuantizerApache(int[] pixels, Parameters params) {
075                params.check();
076                this.params = params;
077                centers = cluster(pixels);
078                colormap = makeColorMap();
079        }
080        
081        public KMeansClusteringQuantizerApache(int[] pixels) {
082                this(pixels, new Parameters());
083        }
084        
085        // --------------------------------------------------------------
086
087        private List<CentroidCluster<DoublePoint>> cluster(int[] pixels) {
088                KMeansPlusPlusClusterer<DoublePoint> clusterer = 
089                                new KMeansPlusPlusClusterer<>(params.maxColors, params.maxIterations);
090                
091                List<DoublePoint> points = new ArrayList<>();
092                for (int i = 0; i < pixels.length; i++) {
093                        points.add(new DoublePoint(intToRgbDouble(pixels[i])));
094                }
095                
096                List<CentroidCluster<DoublePoint>> result = clusterer.cluster(points);
097                return result;
098        }
099        
100        // --------------------------------------------------------------
101
102        private double[] intToRgbDouble(int rgb) {
103                int red   = ((rgb >> 16) & 0xFF);
104                int grn = ((rgb >> 8) & 0xFF);
105                int blu  = (rgb & 0xFF);
106                return new double[] {red, grn, blu};
107        }
108
109        private float[][] makeColorMap() {
110                List<float[]> colList = new LinkedList<>();
111                
112                for (CentroidCluster<DoublePoint> ctr : centers) {
113                        double[] c = ctr.getCenter().getPoint();
114                        float red = (float) c[0];
115                        float grn = (float) c[1];
116                        float blu = (float) c[2];
117                        colList.add(new float[] {red, grn, blu});
118                }
119                
120                return colList.toArray(new float[0][]);
121        }
122        
123        /**
124         * Lists the color clusters to System.out (intended for debugging only).
125         */
126//      public void listClusters() {
127//              for (Cluster c : clusters) {
128//                      System.out.println(c.toString());
129//              }
130//      }
131        
132
133        // ------- methods required by abstract super class -----------------------
134        
135        @Override
136        public float[][] getColorMap() {
137                return colormap;
138        }
139        
140        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
141        
142        public static void main(String[] args) {
143//              String path = "D:/svn-book/Book/img/ch-color-images/alps-01s.png";
144//              String path = "D:/svn-book/Book/img/ch-color-images/desaturation-hsv/balls.jpg";
145                String path = "C:/_SVN/svn-book/Book/img/ch-color-images/desaturation-hsv/balls.jpg";
146                
147//              String path = "D:/svn-book/Book/img/ch-color-images/single-color.png";
148//              String path = "D:/svn-book/Book/img/ch-color-images/two-colors.png";
149//              String path = "D:/svn-book/Book/img/ch-color-images/random-colors.png";
150//              String path = "D:/svn-book/Book/img/ch-color-images/ramp-fire.png";
151                
152                int K = 16; 
153                System.out.println("image = " + path);
154                System.out.println("K = " + K);
155
156                ImagePlus im = IJ.openImage(path);
157                if (im == null) {
158                        System.out.println("could not open: " + path);
159                        return;
160                }
161                
162                ImageProcessor ip = im.getProcessor();
163                ColorProcessor cp = ip.convertToColorProcessor();
164                
165                Parameters params = new Parameters();
166                params.maxColors = K;
167                ColorQuantizer quantizer = new KMeansClusteringQuantizerApache(cp, params);
168                quantizer.listColorMap();
169                
170                System.out.println("quantizing image");
171                ByteProcessor qi = quantizer.quantize(cp);
172                System.out.println("showing image");
173                (new ImagePlus("quantizez", qi)).show();
174                
175        }
176        
177} 
178
